name: v1.5.0
body:
Minimum bazel version: **7.0.0**

If you're using `bzlmod`, add the following to `MODULE.bazel`:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "toolchains_llvm", version = "1.5.0")

# Configure and register the toolchain.
llvm = use_extension("@toolchains_llvm//toolchain/extensions:llvm.bzl", "llvm")
llvm.toolchain(
   llvm_version = "16.0.0",
)

use_repo(llvm, "llvm_toolchain")
# use_repo(llvm, "llvm_toolchain_llvm") # if you depend on specific tools in scripts

register_toolchains("@llvm_toolchain//:all")
```

To directly use a commit from GitHub, add this block and replace commit with the commit you want.
```starlark
git_override(
  module_name = "toolchains_llvm",
  commit = "0bdeae25025aeb6f914db2a02cb2efeb302743b5",
  remote = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm",
)
```

If not using `bzlmod`, include this section in your `WORKSPACE`:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "toolchains_llvm",
    sha256 = "49e69c011bcaa4c9a7246a287ab1fb4f7ed3fde7cbd7300374c1030f40d2bb95",
    strip_prefix = "toolchains_llvm-v1.5.0",
    canonical_id = "v1.5.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/releases/download/v1.5.0/toolchains_llvm-v1.5.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@toolchains_llvm//toolchain:deps.bzl", "bazel_toolchain_dependencies")

bazel_toolchain_dependencies()

load("@bazel_features//:deps.bzl", "bazel_features_deps")

bazel_features_deps()

load("@rules_cc//cc:extensions.bzl", "compatibility_proxy_repo")

compatibility_proxy_repo()

load("@toolchains_llvm//toolchain:rules.bzl", "llvm_toolchain")

llvm_toolchain(
    name = "llvm_toolchain",
    llvm_version = "16.0.0",
)

load("@llvm_toolchain//:toolchains.bzl", "llvm_register_toolchains")

llvm_register_toolchains()
```


## What's Changed
* Add 20.1.3 by @helly25 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/482
* Simplify url generation by @helly25 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/484
* Add missing distributions and check for omissions by @helly25 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/486
* Print the checksum strings as needed. by @helly25 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/487
* Tweaks by @helly25 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/489
* Expand glob of toolchain /lib and /include by @mbeards in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/491
* Add 20.1.4 by @helly25 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/492
* Verify the current resolution by @helly25 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/490
* Find LLVM distributions automatically. by @helly25 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/471
* Improve the distribution finding and comment on some of the unexpected support. by @helly25 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/493
* Improve error messages. by @helly25 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/494
* Add extra_llvm_distributions attribute by @helly25 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/495
* Platform i686 is of course still 32bit... by @helly25 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/496
* toolchain config: use "-l:libc++.a" and "-l:libc++abi.a" in sysroot by @malt3 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/498
* Add LLVM distributions. by @helly25 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/499
* Add more 20.1.5 llvm_distributions by @helly25 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/500
* Add support for x86_64-unknown-none targets by @jblebrun in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/502
* Add first 20.1.6 distributions. by @helly25 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/504
* More 20.1.6 distributions. by @helly25 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/505
* Allow urls in llvm_extra_distributions by @helly25 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/501
* Reduce golden test output. by @helly25 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/506
* Add 20.1.7 by @helly25 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/509
* Update dependency rules_foreign_cc by @renovate[bot] in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/513
* Mark repository as reproducible by @mering in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/515
* support runtime/test-time compiler invokations by @TroyKomodo in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/518
* Fix a `_strip_prefix` call site by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/520
* Add 20.1.8 by @helly25 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/526
* Additional 20.1.7 distributions by @helly25 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/527
* Add support for `parse_headers` by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/524
* Make `wasm-ld` optional by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/529
* Add support for riscv32-unknown-none-elf targets by @kitterion in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/530
* Mark downloaded repository as reproducible by @trevorgray in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/531
* Use debian bookworm by @helly25 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/541
* Add LLVM release 21.1.0. by @helly25 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/539
* Add fastbuild_compile_flags by @mering in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/536

## New Contributors
* @mbeards made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/491
* @malt3 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/498
* @jblebrun made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/502
* @TroyKomodo made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/518
* @kitterion made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/530
* @trevorgray made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/531

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/compare/v1.4.0...v1.5.0

name: v1.4.0
body:
Minimum bazel version: **7.0.0**

If you're using `bzlmod`, add the following to `MODULE.bazel`:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "toolchains_llvm", version = "1.4.0")

# Configure and register the toolchain.
llvm = use_extension("@toolchains_llvm//toolchain/extensions:llvm.bzl", "llvm")
llvm.toolchain(
   llvm_version = "16.0.0",
)

use_repo(llvm, "llvm_toolchain")
# use_repo(llvm, "llvm_toolchain_llvm") # if you depend on specific tools in scripts

register_toolchains("@llvm_toolchain//:all")
```

To directly use a commit from GitHub, add this block and replace commit with the commit you want.
```starlark
git_override(
  module_name = "toolchains_llvm",
  commit = "4c3d6cfc62d4639106d807476aa1702dfc2c884b",
  remote = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm",
)
```

If not using `bzlmod`, include this section in your `WORKSPACE`:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "toolchains_llvm",
    sha256 = "fded02569617d24551a0ad09c0750dc53a3097237157b828a245681f0ae739f8",
    strip_prefix = "toolchains_llvm-v1.4.0",
    canonical_id = "v1.4.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/releases/download/v1.4.0/toolchains_llvm-v1.4.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@toolchains_llvm//toolchain:deps.bzl", "bazel_toolchain_dependencies")

bazel_toolchain_dependencies()

load("@toolchains_llvm//toolchain:rules.bzl", "llvm_toolchain")

llvm_toolchain(
    name = "llvm_toolchain",
    llvm_version = "16.0.0",
)

load("@llvm_toolchain//:toolchains.bzl", "llvm_register_toolchains")

llvm_register_toolchains()
```


## What's Changed
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_java to v8.7.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/449
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_java to v8.8.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/450
* Add linux-aarch64 for 19.1.3 by @jwnimmer-tri in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/458
* Add LLVM 19.1.4...19.1.7 by @helly25 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/461
* Doc update by @helly25 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/462
* Add more tools by default by @helly25 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/463
* Support WebAssembly target platforms wasm{32,64}-wasip1 by @piob-io in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/466
* Update llvm_distributions.bzl to support clang 19 for Linux ARM64 by @jayakasadev in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/467
* Silence "canonical reproducible form" warning from repo rule by @jwnimmer-tri in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/468
* Add LLVM 20.1.0 by @AlexDenisov in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/469
* Add the missing 20.1.0 parts. by @helly25 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/470
* Emit canonical labels if needed in `pkg_name_from_label` by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/447
* Add 20.1.1 by @helly25 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/475
* Add initial support for linux-armv7 by @UebelAndre in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/477
* chore(deps): update dependency com_google_googletest to v1.16.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/455
* Add new version 20.1.2 and missing parts of 20.1.1 by @helly25 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/478
* Create sanitized response file instead of expanding arguments by @dfreese in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/480

## New Contributors
* @jwnimmer-tri made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/458
* @piob-io made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/466
* @jayakasadev made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/467
* @AlexDenisov made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/469
* @UebelAndre made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/477
* @dfreese made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/480

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/compare/v1.3.0...v1.4.0

name: v1.3.0
body:
Minimum bazel version: **7.0.0**

If you're using `bzlmod`, add the following to `MODULE.bazel`:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "toolchains_llvm", version = "1.3.0")

# Configure and register the toolchain.
llvm = use_extension("@toolchains_llvm//toolchain/extensions:llvm.bzl", "llvm")
llvm.toolchain(
   llvm_version = "16.0.0",
)

use_repo(llvm, "llvm_toolchain")
# use_repo(llvm, "llvm_toolchain_llvm") # if you depend on specific tools in scripts

register_toolchains("@llvm_toolchain//:all")
```

To directly use a commit from GitHub, add this block and replace commit with the commit you want.
```starlark
git_override(
  module_name = "toolchains_llvm",
  commit = "b3c96d2dbc698eab752366bbe747e2a7df7fa504",
  remote = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm",
)
```

If not using `bzlmod`, include this section in your `WORKSPACE`:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "toolchains_llvm",
    sha256 = "d3c255b2ceec9eaebb6b5a44c904a48429b8dcb71e630de2f103e7b4aab9f073",
    strip_prefix = "toolchains_llvm-v1.3.0",
    canonical_id = "v1.3.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/releases/download/v1.3.0/toolchains_llvm-v1.3.0.tar.gz",

load("@toolchains_llvm//toolchain:deps.bzl", "bazel_toolchain_dependencies")

    name = "llvm_toolchain",
    llvm_version = "16.0.0",

load("@llvm_toolchain//:toolchains.bzl", "llvm_register_toolchains")

llvm_register_toolchains()
```


## What's Changed
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_rust by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/387
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_rust to v0.52.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/397
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_rust to v0.52.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/398
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_rust to v0.52.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/399
* chore(deps): update dependency io_bazel_rules_go to v0.50.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/383
* ci: update `libtinfo5` installation for Ubuntu 24.04 by @rrbutani in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/401
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_go to v0.50.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/384
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_foreign_cc to v0.12.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/377
* Support WebAssembly target platforms `wasm{32,64}-unknown-unknown` by @jmillikin in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/405
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_rust to v0.53.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/406
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_rust to v0.53.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/407
* Fix test module for Bazel 8 by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/410
* Fix shfmt config to disable Bash code simplification by @thirtyseven in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/411
* Make sure that only expands existing response files by @ormandi in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/409
* Add support for 19.1.1-3 by @amessing in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/412
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_rust to v0.54.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/414
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_rust to v0.54.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/416
* fix: Skip cxx_builtin_include_directories filtering when remote by @honnix in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/415
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_foreign_cc to v0.13.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/420
* [CI] Fix for bazel 8.x by @keith in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/427
* Add dynamic-stdc++ by @keith in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/400
* Remove native-java buildifier warning by @keith in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/428
* chore(deps): update dependency com_google_protobuf to v29.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/429
* chore(deps): update dependency com_google_protobuf to v29.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/434
* Plumb conly_flags through to the toolchain by @AustinSchuh in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/435
* Add support for extracting zst LLVM distributions by @AustinSchuh in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/433
* Add support for nixos by @DD5HT in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/436
* chore(deps): update dependency platforms to v0.0.11 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/439
* cc_toolchain: prefix include directories with `%workspace%` by @ParkMyCar in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/438
* Expose clang-format, git-clang-format, and libclang by @AustinSchuh in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/432
* Remove -fdebug-prefix-map for toolchain by @keith in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/440
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_java to v8.7.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/442
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_python to v1.1.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/443
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_java to v8.7.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/446

## New Contributors
* @jmillikin made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/405
* @thirtyseven made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/411
* @ormandi made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/409
* @amessing made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/412
* @honnix made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/415
* @AustinSchuh made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/435
* @DD5HT made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/436
* @ParkMyCar made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/438

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/compare/v1.2.0...v1.3.0

name: v1.2.0
body:
Minimum bazel version: **7.0.0**

If you're using `bzlmod`, add the following to `MODULE.bazel`:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "toolchains_llvm", version = "1.2.0")

# Configure and register the toolchain.
llvm = use_extension("@toolchains_llvm//toolchain/extensions:llvm.bzl", "llvm")
llvm.toolchain(
   llvm_version = "16.0.0",
)

use_repo(llvm, "llvm_toolchain")
# use_repo(llvm, "llvm_toolchain_llvm") # if you depend on specific tools in scripts

register_toolchains("@llvm_toolchain//:all")
```

To directly use a commit from GitHub, add this block and replace commit with the commit you want.
```starlark
git_override(
  module_name = "toolchains_llvm",
  commit = "6edc43be7e52d9f44bc842a9956bd40213b972b1",
  remote = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm",
)
```

If not using `bzlmod`, include this section in your `WORKSPACE`:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "toolchains_llvm",
    sha256 = "e3fb6dc6b77eaf167cb2b0c410df95d09127cbe20547e5a329c771808a816ab4",
    strip_prefix = "toolchains_llvm-v1.2.0",
    canonical_id = "v1.2.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/releases/download/v1.2.0/toolchains_llvm-v1.2.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@toolchains_llvm//toolchain:deps.bzl", "bazel_toolchain_dependencies")

    llvm_version = "16.0.0",

llvm_register_toolchains()
```


## What's Changed
* chore(deps): update dependency abseil-cpp to v20240722 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/367
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_rust to v0.49.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/365
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_rust to v0.49.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/368
* chore(deps): update dependency com_google_absl to v20240722 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/366
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_rust to v0.49.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/369
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_foreign_cc to v0.12.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/373
* chore(deps): update dependency rules_rust to v0.49.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/370
* Added support for 18.1.8, extended 18.1.7 by @svenpanne in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/374
* Export share/clang/* from llvm_toolchain by @mrkkrp in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/375
* Make LLD work with clang18 by @dzbarsky in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/379
* Add new arm64 macOS binary by @keith in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/381
* Update apple `release_name` for version >= 18 by @Danielkonge in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/382
* Allow user provided platform constraints by @jkurland-roku in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/371
* Add LLVM 19 by @mering in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/392
* Allow debian to use LLVM 18 by @TylerSeanRau in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/394
* Added option to skip linking against `libunwind`  by @mmaslankaprv in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/346
* Fix release notes template tag. by @sputt in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/393

## New Contributors
* @svenpanne made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/374
* @mrkkrp made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/375
* @Danielkonge made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/382

* @mmaslankaprv made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/346

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/compare/v1.1.2...v1.2.0

name: v1.1.2
body:
Minimum bazel version: **7.0.0**

If you're using `bzlmod`, add the following to `MODULE.bazel`:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "toolchains_llvm", version = "v1.1.2")

# To directly use a commit from GitHub, replace commit with the commit you want.
# Otherwise, omit this block.
git_override(
  module_name = "toolchains_llvm",
  commit = "e0ffa169a2572e9f35a52de60fe746831d1e2a0a",
  remote = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm",
)

# Configure and register the toolchain.
llvm = use_extension("@toolchains_llvm//toolchain/extensions:llvm.bzl", "llvm")
llvm.toolchain(
   llvm_version = "16.0.0",
)

use_repo(llvm, "llvm_toolchain")
# use_repo(llvm, "llvm_toolchain_llvm") # if you depend on specific tools in scripts

register_toolchains("@llvm_toolchain//:all")
```

If not using `bzlmod`, include this section in your `WORKSPACE`:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "toolchains_llvm",
    sha256 = "c304fc9286c6fa2acb6dcea8961dc0d526a076f8cb64da4763c36aebcf5cff56",
    strip_prefix = "toolchains_llvm-v1.1.2",
    canonical_id = "v1.1.2",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/releases/download/v1.1.2/toolchains_llvm-v1.1.2.tar.gz",
)

load("@toolchains_llvm//toolchain:deps.bzl", "bazel_toolchain_dependencies")

bazel_toolchain_dependencies()

load("@toolchains_llvm//toolchain:rules.bzl", "llvm_toolchain")

llvm_toolchain(
    name = "llvm_toolchain",
    llvm_version = "16.0.0",
)

load("@llvm_toolchain//:toolchains.bzl", "llvm_register_toolchains")

llvm_register_toolchains()
```


## What's Changed
* Fix `source.template.json` by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/364


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/compare/v1.1.1...v1.1.2

name: v1.1.1
body:
Minimum bazel version: **7.0.0**

If you're using `bzlmod`, add the following to `MODULE.bazel`:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "toolchains_llvm", version = "v1.1.1")

# To directly use a commit from GitHub, replace commit with the commit you want.
# Otherwise, omit this block.
git_override(
  module_name = "toolchains_llvm",
  commit = "6117a351efc2e12a98f58162b0c5f75ca68510f7",
  remote = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm",
)

# Configure and register the toolchain.
llvm = use_extension("@toolchains_llvm//toolchain/extensions:llvm.bzl", "llvm")
llvm.toolchain(
   llvm_version = "16.0.0",
)

use_repo(llvm, "llvm_toolchain")
# use_repo(llvm, "llvm_toolchain_llvm") # if you depend on specific tools in scripts

register_toolchains("@llvm_toolchain//:all")
```

If not using `bzlmod`, include this section in your `WORKSPACE`:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "toolchains_llvm",
    sha256 = "644668929813e99430e27d45d95d070ffa0046291e8de8f7bd2af289799567bd",
    strip_prefix = "toolchains_llvm-v1.1.1",
    canonical_id = "v1.1.1",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/releases/download/v1.1.1/toolchains_llvm-v1.1.1.tar.gz",
)

load("@toolchains_llvm//toolchain:deps.bzl", "bazel_toolchain_dependencies")

bazel_toolchain_dependencies()

load("@toolchains_llvm//toolchain:rules.bzl", "llvm_toolchain")

llvm_toolchain(
    name = "llvm_toolchain",
    llvm_version = "16.0.0",
)

load("@llvm_toolchain//:toolchains.bzl", "llvm_register_toolchains")

llvm_register_toolchains()
```


## What's Changed
* Add Publish to BCR setup by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/363


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/compare/v1.1.0...v1.1.1

name: v1.1.0
body:
Minimum bazel version: **7.0.0**

If you're using `bzlmod`, add the following to `MODULE.bazel`:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "toolchains_llvm", version = "v1.1.0")

# To directly use a commit from GitHub, replace commit with the commit you want.
# Otherwise, omit this block.
git_override(
  module_name = "toolchains_llvm",
  commit = "8bf80b5ca3fa79ec278f3c172a9b78d3f9748d3b",
  remote = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm",
)

# Configure and register the toolchain.
llvm = use_extension("@toolchains_llvm//toolchain/extensions:llvm.bzl", "llvm")
llvm.toolchain(
   llvm_version = "16.0.0",
)

use_repo(llvm, "llvm_toolchain")
# use_repo(llvm, "llvm_toolchain_llvm") # if you depend on specific tools in scripts

register_toolchains("@llvm_toolchain//:all")
```

If not using `bzlmod`, include this section in your `WORKSPACE`:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "toolchains_llvm",
    sha256 = "f60727ccc31b578f9b9689064a21c874165a9652d4b0f43817c5eda479f1e3df",
    strip_prefix = "toolchains_llvm-v1.1.0",
    canonical_id = "v1.1.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/releases/download/v1.1.0/toolchains_llvm-v1.1.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@toolchains_llvm//toolchain:deps.bzl", "bazel_toolchain_dependencies")

bazel_toolchain_dependencies()

load("@toolchains_llvm//toolchain:rules.bzl", "llvm_toolchain")

llvm_toolchain(
    name = "llvm_toolchain",
    llvm_version = "16.0.0",
)

load("@llvm_toolchain//:toolchains.bzl", "llvm_register_toolchains")

llvm_register_toolchains()
```


## What's Changed
* Update compability_level in MODULE.bazel by @siddharthab in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/295
* Revert "Update compability_level in MODULE.bazel" by @siddharthab in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/296
* Also test docker exec test without bzlmod by @siddharthab in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/297
* Revert accidental deletion by @siddharthab in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/299
* Add LLVM 18 links by @adzenith in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/302
* Add llvm-profdata for coverage data merging by @fernride-jissing in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/307
* Update buildifier by @keith in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/311
* Use paths.join for sysroot_prefix by @keith in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/310
* Fix double slashes for sysroot = / by @keith in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/312
* Fix CI by switching back to x86 Mac runners by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/320
* Add two more aliased tools by @jez in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/321
* Add 18.1.3, 18.1.4, 18.1.5 downloads by @lalten in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/325
* Force Clang modules with LLVM >= 14 by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/337
* feat: add 18.1.6 and 18.1.7 by @peakschris in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/341
* Fix support for --incompatible_disallow_empty_glob by @keith in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/331

(renovate PRs omitted)

## New Contributors
* @fernride-jissing made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/307
* @peakschris made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/341

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/compare/1.0.0...v1.1.0

Minimum bazel version: **7.0.0**

If you're using `bzlmod`, add the following to `MODULE.bazel`:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "toolchains_llvm", version = "1.0.0")

# To directly use a commit from GitHub, replace commit with the commit you want.
# Otherwise, omit this block.
git_override(
  module_name = "toolchains_llvm",
  commit = "329910897f3114f3f5d24407d9abf49b244056d2",
  remote = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm",
)

# Configure and register the toolchain.
llvm = use_extension("@toolchains_llvm//toolchain/extensions:llvm.bzl", "llvm")
llvm.toolchain(
   llvm_version = "16.0.0",
)

use_repo(llvm, "llvm_toolchain")
# use_repo(llvm, "llvm_toolchain_llvm") # if you depend on specific tools in scripts

register_toolchains("@llvm_toolchain//:all")
```

If not using `bzlmod`, include this section in your `WORKSPACE`:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "toolchains_llvm",
    sha256 = "e91c4361f99011a54814e1afbe5c436e0d329871146a3cd58c23a2b4afb50737",
    strip_prefix = "toolchains_llvm-1.0.0",
    canonical_id = "1.0.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/releases/download/1.0.0/toolchains_llvm-1.0.0.tar.gz",
)

load("@toolchains_llvm//toolchain:deps.bzl", "bazel_toolchain_dependencies")

bazel_toolchain_dependencies()

load("@toolchains_llvm//toolchain:rules.bzl", "llvm_toolchain")

llvm_toolchain(
    name = "llvm_toolchain",
    llvm_version = "16.0.0",
)

load("@llvm_toolchain//:toolchains.bzl", "llvm_register_toolchains")

llvm_register_toolchains()
```


## What's Changed
* Fix release notes template by @mikebauer in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/222
* Avoid calling xcrun on darwin if we don't need to by @dzbarsky in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/223
* add 14.0.6 with arm64 apple-darwin by @nolen777 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/225
* Set release name for ubuntu + 17.0.2 by @oliverlee in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/226
* Better document supports_dynamic_linker by @siddharthab in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/230
* Use rctx.read instead of cat to parse /etc/os-release by @dzbarsky in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/231
* Update 17.0.1 and 17.0.2 hashes by @adzenith in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/232
* update hashes for 17.03, 17.04 by @asa in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/239
* add 17.0.2 for macOS arm64 by @garymm in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/236
* Add all_includes target for building loadable clang-tidy plugins by @molar in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/188
* 17.0.5 and 17.0.6 for x86_64 by @steple in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/241
* Add support for `layering_check` by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/246
* Prepare for transfer to bazel-contrib by @siddharthab in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/251
* Configure Renovate by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/252
* List new shasum for recent releases by @siddharthab in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/255
* Update dependency bazel_skylib to v1.5.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/260
* Update dependency com_google_googletest to v1.14.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/266
* Update dependency bazel_skylib to v1.5.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/264
* Update dependency com_github_google_benchmark to v1.8.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/265
* Update dependency rules_foreign_cc to v0.10.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/267
* Update rules_rust digest to a844b19 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/263
* Update actions/checkout action to v4 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/269
* Update dependency rules_rust to v0.38.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/268
* Update dependency rules_cc to v0.0.9 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/271
* Update dependency platforms to v0.0.8 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/270
* Update dependency rules_rust to v0.39.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/274
* Add support for Oracle Linux by @scasagrande in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/278
* Update dependency rules_rust to v0.40.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/279
* Update softprops/action-gh-release action to v2 by @renovate in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/282
* Add support for AlmaLinux by @scasagrande in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/281
* Add planned members to code owners by @siddharthab in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/283
* Move minimum supported version to Bazel 7.0.0 by @siddharthab in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/229
* Update remaining deps by @siddharthab in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/284
* Do not fail if not matching LLVM toolchain root is found by @gferon in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/249
* Add missing LLVM binaries by @Bo98 in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/277
* Also check VERSION_CODENAME by @siddharthab in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/285
* Do not assume ID_LIKE by @siddharthab in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/287
* Resolve `Label`s for toolchain roots and sysroots correctly under `bzlmod` by @rrbutani in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/235
* Fix typo in test script by @siddharthab in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/288
* Warn when not generating toolchain by @siddharthab in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/289
* Fix santizers on MacOS that require dylibs in the LLVM toolchain. by @timbess in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/250
* Revert "Warn when not generating toolchain" by @siddharthab in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/290
* Add `extra_compiler_files` attribute to make ignorelist files available to sanitizers during compilation by @lalten in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/245
* Support exec platform different from host by @siddharthab in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/292
* Support LLD linker for Darwin by @siddharthab in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/286
* Make system module map generation faster and fully hermetic by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/280
* Replace references of "host" with "exec". by @siddharthab in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/294

## New Contributors
* @mikebauer made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/222
* @nolen777 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/225
* @asa made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/239
* @molar made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/188
* @steple made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/241
* @fmeum made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/246
* @renovate made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/252
* @Bo98 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/277
* @timbess made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/pull/250

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazel-contrib/toolchains_llvm/compare/0.10.3...1.0.0

Minimum bazel version: **6.0.0** (6.1.0 if using blzmod)

If you're using `bzlmod`, add the following to `MODULE.bazel`:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "toolchains_llvm", version = "0.10.3")

# To directly use a commit from GitHub, replace commit with the commit you want.
# Otherwise, omit this block.
git_override(
  module_name = "toolchains_llvm",
  commit = "42e0b400fe316797657ccc5d7d2f9bb6f13071d8",
  remote = "https://github.com/grailbio/bazel-toolchain",
)

# Configure and register the toolchain.
llvm = use_extension("@toolchains_llvm//toolchain/extensions:llvm.bzl", "llvm")
llvm.toolchain(
   llvm_version = "16.0.0",
)

use_repo(llvm, "llvm_toolchain")
# use_repo(llvm, "llvm_toolchain_llvm") # if you depend on specific tools in scripts

register_toolchains("@llvm_toolchain//:all")
```

To not using `bzlmod`, include this section in your `WORKSPACE`:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

http_archive(
    name = "toolchains_llvm",
    sha256 = "b7cd301ef7b0ece28d20d3e778697a5e3b81828393150bed04838c0c52963a01",
    strip_prefix = "toolchains_llvm-0.10.3",
    canonical_id = "0.10.3",
    url = "https://github.com/grailbio/bazel-toolchain/releases/download/0.10.3/toolchains_llvm-0.10.3.tar.gz",
)

load("@toolchains_llvm//toolchain:deps.bzl", "bazel_toolchain_dependencies")

bazel_toolchain_dependencies()

load("@toolchains_llvm//toolchain:rules.bzl", "llvm_toolchain")

llvm_toolchain(
    name = "llvm_toolchain",
    llvm_version = "16.0.0",
)

load("@llvm_toolchain//:toolchains.bzl", "llvm_register_toolchains")

llvm_register_toolchains()
```

And add the following section to your .bazelrc file:

```sh
# Not needed after https://github.com/bazelbuild/bazel/issues/7260 is closed
build --incompatible_enable_cc_toolchain_resolution

# For macOS only:

# Needed for Bazel versions before 7.
# Without this, one can use `--linkopt='-undefined dynamic_lookup'`.
# This feature is intentionally not supported on macOS.
build --features=-supports_dynamic_linker
# Not needed after https://github.com/grailbio/bazel-toolchain/pull/229.
build --features=-libtool
```


## What's Changed
* 15.0.2 and fixes /etc/os-release parsing bug by @scasagrande in https://github.com/grailbio/bazel-toolchain/pull/217
* Forward all attributes to bzlmod extension by @siddharthab in https://github.com/grailbio/bazel-toolchain/pull/218
* Add 16.0.5 and 16.0.6 distributions by @adzenith in https://github.com/grailbio/bazel-toolchain/pull/220
* Update LLVM versions in tests by @siddharthab in https://github.com/grailbio/bazel-toolchain/pull/221

## New Contributors
* @adzenith made their first contribution in https://github.com/grailbio/bazel-toolchain/pull/220

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/grailbio/bazel-toolchain/compare/0.10.2...0.10.3

name: Release 0.10.0
body:
Changes since 0.9:

- Rename to toolchains_llvm
- Other minor invisible cleanups

This release is intended to be the first publication to Bazel Central Registry.

name: Release 0.9
body:
Changes since release 0.8:

- Support for bzlmod.
- Better support for newer versions of macOS.
- Support for Apple silicon.
- More robust LLVM release detection.
- Miscellaneous cleanups.

Many thanks to everyone who contributed. This release would not have been possible without so many good quality community contributions.

name: Release 0.8
body:
Changes since 0.7

- Do not depend on gcc or libgcc install
- Fix default key logic in urls attribute
- Properly handle system paths for LLVM distribution
- Fix use of absolute paths with sysroots
- Support for Pop!_OS and RHEL in LLVM fetch logic
- Small code and documentation cleanups
- Fix support for Bazel 4.2
- Support for LLVM 14
- Minor bug fixes

name: Release 0.7
body:
Changes since release 0.6.3:

- Ability to override compiler and linker flags from different bazel feature groups (https://github.com/grailbio/bazel-toolchain/commit/c0e0937e63b8adbd04f89782e171103a1590e33b).
- URLs for LLVM archives as an alternative to `toolchain_roots` through `http_archive` (https://github.com/grailbio/bazel-toolchain/commit/c728048463e8d81d38ece761165b341738cd8d07).
- stdlib implementation and cxx_standard can now be specified (https://github.com/grailbio/bazel-toolchain/commit/38ab9f6f4994bf146e67b261f67f0a98ee265e77 and https://github.com/grailbio/bazel-toolchain/commit/5105e05f4a342ce79fc1d1ecb465033c69782a84).
- Convenience targets for `libomp`, `clang-format` and `llvm-cov` in `@llvm_toolchain//` (https://github.com/grailbio/bazel-toolchain/commit/7e2edd4af45c7f1b894dd284630ad8a1b2405dbe and https://github.com/grailbio/bazel-toolchain/commit/c728048463e8d81d38ece761165b341738cd8d07).
- [breaking] lpthread and ldl are now removed from default `link_libs` (https://github.com/grailbio/bazel-toolchain/commit/7580bbe44efaf6e41b1b77efc7f890ad6b46494b).

name: Release 0.6.3
body:
### Changes since 0.6.2:
  - The platform targets in `platforms/` are now public (#107, thanks @dududko)
  - `dwp`, `objcopy`, and `strip` binaries are symlinked correctly; this fixes `.stripped` and `.dwp` targets (#108, thanks @fishcakez)
  - Makevars support has been dropped (see [this commit](https://github.com/grailbio/bazel-toolchain/commit/e96102391767edddba3923f3a6861aca1581b5a9))
  - LLVM 13 distributions have been added (#113, thanks @yasushi-saito)
  - LLVM 12.0.1 distributions have also been added
  - Workarounds for old `libtool` versions that don't support parameter files have been added (#115)

### New Contributors
* @dududko made their first contribution in https://github.com/grailbio/bazel-toolchain/pull/107
* @fishcakez made their first contribution in https://github.com/grailbio/bazel-toolchain/pull/108

**Full Diff**: https://github.com/grailbio/bazel-toolchain/compare/0.6.2...0.6.3

name: Release 0.6
body:
Changes since release 0.5:

- [breaking] Minimum required bazel version is now 4.0.0.
- [breaking] Attributes of `llvm_toolchain` rule have been changed or deleted.
- Support for LLVM versions up to 12.0.0.
- We now track cc_toolchain_config from @bazel_tools giving us LTO, etc. (thanks @rrbutani).
- LLVM distribution and toolchain configuration are now separate repos.
- Cross-compilation is now supported.
- Better and more detection of host OS.
- Mirror URLs are now tried first.
- netrc auth support for private mirror for LLVM downloads.
- Support and test compatibility with rules_foreign_cc.
- Minor fixes.

name: Release 0.5
body:
Changes since release 0.4:
- Compatibility updates for bazel versions up till 2.1.1.
- Support for LLVM versions 8.0.0 and 9.0.0.
- Attribute for builtin include directories (53ce45e7559a59e9ff4917e39372b41276ff30c9).
- Undefine FORTIFY_SOURCE instead of defining as 0 (9c20deb1d0a8e32ab32990b31dba940b4dbce01f).
- Omit --gc-sections from macOS optimized builds (0cf1d783864e96ebb65966b0aeff928981334e73).
- Add '-undefined dynamic_lookup' to macOS linker (64bb7aa409c384fb9a35f331adb31658f08eb8bb).
- Toolchain registration (if toolchain resolution is enabled through `--incompatible_enable_cc_toolchain_resolution`).

name: Release 0.4
body:
- Compatibility updates for newer bazel versions. Tested with bazel 0.19.1 and 0.22.
- Compatibility fixes for github.com/bazelbuild/rules_go.
- Support for a custom sysroot.
- Default macOS sysroot from `xcrun` (needed for Mojave)
- Use lld as linker in linux as default (needs LLVM 7+)

name: Release 0.1
body:
The toolchain is now ready for general use.

Please keep in mind that the aim here is to provide an example configuration. You may have to fork your own branch for tweaks to suit your setup.
